operations.notes:
Creates a new Charge Code in the agilquest System. Charge Codes are used for calculating reservation costs and applied to specific Resources over the course of a Reservation.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_CHARGE_CODES ALWAYS

This operation requires a Charge Code Data value.

This operation returns a Charge Code Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to create Charge Codes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Charge Code Data

If the Charge Code data provided is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

Required Data Exception if any data provided for the Charge Code is invalid or missing.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Charge Code Data value to update and existing Charge Code in the Agilquest.com System.
parameters.name: _modCCData

operations.notes:
Updates an existing Charge Code value as identified by the ID of the Charge Code value passed in with the values of the passed in Charge Code value. Charge Codes are used for calculating reservation costs.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_CHARGE_CODES ALWAYS

This operation requires a Charge Code Data value.

This operation returns a Charge Code Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to update Charge Codes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Charge Code Not Found

If the Charge Code value identified cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Charge Code Data value matching the provided update value cannot be found.

Invalid Charge Code Data

If the Charge Code data provided is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

Required Data Exception if any data provided for the Charge Code is invalid or missing.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Retrieves a list of all Charge Code descriptors for the Account associated with the Application Authentication Token provided. Each Charge Code descriptor provides the name and code for the Charge Code it represents. Charge Codes are used in creating Reservations where the Resource requires a Charge Code as indicated by the Resource's Charge Code Type.

Field NameDescription
name String Name of the charge code.
chargeCode String Charge Code value as defined in the System.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User Authentication Token is invalid the following exception is returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Integer SYSID of the Charge Code to remove from the system.
parameters.name: sysidChargeCode

operations.notes:
Deletes the Charge Code value identified by the sysidChargeCode path parameter. If the given ID does not point to an existing charge code, a NotFoundException is returned.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_CHARGE_CODES ALWAYS

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to delete Charge Codes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Charge Code Not Found

If the Charge Code value identified cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Charge Code Data value matching the provided SYSID cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.
